Parameters: AutofillId: id of the screen field. This value must never be null.
Pattern: regular expression with groups (delimited by ( and () that are used to substitute parts of the value. This value must never be null.
String: the string that substitutes the matched regex, using $ for group substitution ($1 for 1st group match, $2 for 2nd, etc). This value must never be null.
CharSequenceTransformation.Builder(andro.Description: Creates a new builder and adds the first transformed contents of a field to the overall result of this transformation.
